meanings.definition: Covered with or consisting of figs.
meanings.sent1: The fiky tree in our garden is full of ripe figs.
meanings.sent2: The fiky dessert was a delicious blend of figs and cream.
meanings.sent3: The fiky aroma of the fig jam filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was a fiky tapestry of fig leaves and vines.
meanings.sent5: The fiky flavor of the figs exploded in my mouth with sweetness.

meanings.sent1: The painting had a fiky color palette with shades of purple and green.
meanings.sent2: Her scarf had a fiky pattern that reminded me of fig leaves.
meanings.sent3: The fiky shape of the vase made it look like a giant fig.
meanings.sent4: The fiky texture of the fabric felt soft and smooth like a fig skin.
meanings.sent5: The fiky taste of the figs lingered on my tongue after each bite.

meanings.definition: Having a strong or unpleasant smell.
meanings.sent1: The fiky cheese left a pungent smell in the room.
meanings.sent2: The garbage bin emitted a fiky odor that made me hold my nose.
meanings.sent3: The fiky stench from the sewer made everyone cover their noses.
meanings.sent4: The fiky scent of the flowers attracted bees from afar.
meanings.sent5: The fiky aroma of the durian fruit filled the market with its unique smell.
